name: SpeedX Bike
title: SpeedX Super Bike for Kids
description: SpeedX Super Bike is designed for young racing enthusiasts. This high-speed toy bike is made with durable plastic and features a sleek design that captures the essence of real racing bikes. With its lightweight structure and easy handling, kids can enjoy endless hours of playtime. The bike also includes stylish decals, making it an attractive addition to any toy collection.

name: Sofa Bed
title: Vivo Sofa Bed
description: This versatile sofa bed from Vivo transforms into a comfortable bed with ease. It’s perfect for guests or smaller spaces, offering both seating and sleeping options.

name: Mi Recliner Chair
title: Mi Recliner Chair
description: The Mi recliner chair offers adjustable reclining features with a cozy, supportive seat. Perfect for reading, watching TV, or relaxing after a long day.

name: Vivo Foldable Sofa
title: Vivo Foldable Sofa
description: The Vivo foldable sofa is a modern and space-saving option. It folds into a comfortable seating option and unfolds for sleeping or lounging, making it ideal for small spaces.

name: Leather Sofa
title: Vivo Leather Sofa
description: This luxurious leather sofa from Vivo adds a touch of sophistication to any room. Its plush cushions and sleek design provide both comfort and style.

name: Mi Modern Chair
title: Mi Modern Accent Chair
description: This modern accent chair from Mi adds style to any space. With its ergonomic design and comfortable seating, it’s perfect for living rooms or offices.

name: Turbo Racer
title: Turbo Racing Bike
description: Turbo Racing Bike is the ultimate toy for kids who love speed and adventure. Equipped with LED lights and realistic sound effects, this bike provides an immersive playtime experience. Made from high-quality materials, it ensures safety while allowing children to enjoy their racing dreams. The striking design and vibrant colors make it a standout toy in any collection.

name: Eco Bike
title: Eco-friendly Toy Bike
description: Eco Bike is a lightweight, eco-friendly toy bike designed for kids who love nature. It is built using sustainable materials and features a unique design that encourages children to develop their motor skills while having fun. The smooth wheels and ergonomic handles provide a comfortable grip, making it perfect for both indoor and outdoor play.

name: Monster Bike
title: Monster Power Bike
description: The Monster Power Bike is built for kids who love thrilling adventures. Featuring a big and bold design, this bike is crafted with high-quality materials that ensure durability and stability. The oversized wheels and sturdy body give it an aggressive look, while the easy-to-ride structure makes it a fantastic gift for young riders.

name: SkyKing Plane
title: SkyKing Jumbo Toy Plane
description: The SkyKing Jumbo Toy Plane is an exciting toy for little aviators. It features real takeoff sounds that make it feel like an authentic airplane. Designed with high-quality materials, this plane has smooth rolling wheels, bright colors, and realistic details that make it look just like a real jumbo jet. It's a must-have for kids who love aviation and imaginative play.

name: JetX Plane
title: JetX Speed Plane
description: JetX Speed Plane is a high-speed jet plane with an aerodynamic design and smooth control. This remote-controlled toy allows kids to experience the thrill of flying their very own jet. The sleek body, bright color combination, and durable materials make it a fantastic gift for aspiring pilots. It is lightweight, easy to operate, and provides hours of fun.

name: Princess Doll
title: Princess Dream Doll
description: The Princess Dream Doll is the perfect companion for children who love fairy tales and magical adventures. Dressed in a stunning gown with intricate details, this doll comes with elegant accessories that add to its charm. Its realistic facial features and silky hair make it even more lifelike, allowing kids to engage in endless storytelling and role-playing fun.

name: Racer Car
title: Racer Super Car
description: Racer Super Car is an ultra-cool toy car designed for kids who love speed and racing. The sleek body, aerodynamic structure, and smooth control make it a top pick among young racers. It is equipped with rolling wheels, a sturdy frame, and a stylish look that makes it an exciting addition to any toy collection.

name: Thunder Car
title: Thunder Lightning Car
description: Thunder Lightning Car is a fast and furious toy car with a powerful engine sound and sleek body. Its vibrant design and high-speed performance make it a thrilling playtime experience for kids. The durable construction ensures long-lasting fun while the realistic details add to the excitement of imaginative play.

name: Monster Truck
title: Big Monster Toy Truck
description: The Big Monster Toy Truck is built for extreme adventures. With large rugged tires and a strong body, this truck can conquer any terrain with ease. Kids will love its realistic design and sturdy build, making it perfect for off-road racing and imaginative play. The bold colors and massive size add to the excitement.

name: Margherita Pizza
title: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A delicious Italian-style pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves. The perfect blend of crispy crust and rich flavors.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
title: BBQ Chicken Delight Pizza
description: A mouthwatering pizza topped with tender BBQ chicken, caramelized onions, and a blend of mozzarella and cheddar cheese, all drizzled with BBQ sauce.

name: Garlic Braised Potato
title: Garlic Butter Braised Potato
description: Soft and flavorful baby potatoes slow-cooked with butter, fresh garlic, and herbs. A perfect side dish that melts in your mouth with every bite.

name: Cheesy Braised Potato
title: Cheesy Delight Braised Potato
description: Golden-brown braised potatoes topped with a rich, creamy cheese sauce and a sprinkle of fresh herbs, making it an irresistible side dish.

name: Spicy Braised Potato
title: Spicy Herb Braised Potato
description: A fiery twist on classic braised potatoes, cooked with chili flakes, garlic, and a hint of smoked paprika for an intense burst of flavors.

name: Classic Chicken Shish Kebab
title: Authentic Chicken Shish Kebab
description: Tender, juicy chicken pieces marinated in Mediterranean spices and grilled to perfection on skewers, served with fresh vegetables and flatbread.

name: Spicy Chicken Shish Kebab
title: Hot & Spicy Chicken Shish Kebab
description: Deliciously grilled chicken skewers with a spicy marinade made from chili, garlic, and aromatic spices, giving you an unforgettable taste experience.

name: Brightening Cream
title: RadiantGlow Brightening Cream
description: RadiantGlow Brightening Cream helps even out skin tone by lightening dark spots and hyperpigmentation. It is packed with powerful ingredients that work to brighten the skin and restore its natural radiance. This cream is perfect for those looking to achieve a luminous and glowing complexion while also reducing the appearance of age spots and blemishes. Ideal for all skin types, it can be used daily for best results.

name: Moisturizing Cream
title: SoftSkin Moisturizing Cream
description: SoftSkin Moisturizing Cream is a rich and nourishing formula designed to hydrate and restore dry, flaky skin. With its blend of natural ingredients, it deeply penetrates the skin, providing long-lasting moisture and softness. The cream creates a protective barrier that keeps your skin feeling hydrated throughout the day. Perfect for use during harsh weather conditions, it helps prevent skin from becoming dry or irritated.

name: Sunscreen Cream
title: SunGuard Sunscreen Cream
description: SunGuard Sunscreen Cream is a lightweight, non-greasy sunscreen that provides broad-spectrum protection against harmful UV rays. With SPF 50+, this cream helps protect your skin from sun damage and premature aging caused by exposure to the sun. Its moisturizing properties ensure that your skin stays hydrated while being shielded from the sun's harmful effects. Perfect for everyday use and ideal for outdoor activities.

name: Nourishing Cream
title: HerbalEssence Nourishing Cream
description: HerbalEssence Nourishing Cream is packed with herbal extracts that provide deep hydration and restore the natural balance of your skin. It nourishes the skin, making it soft, smooth, and supple. The cream also helps to improve elasticity, leaving your skin looking youthful and radiant. Suitable for dry and sensitive skin, it helps to calm irritation and reduce redness while giving your skin the nourishment it needs.

name: Soothing Cream
title: CalmSkin Soothing Cream
description: CalmSkin Soothing Cream is designed to relieve skin irritation and redness. Ideal for sensitive and irritated skin, this cream helps calm and soothe the skin, providing immediate relief. It has anti-inflammatory properties that reduce swelling and discomfort, making it perfect for use after sun exposure, shaving, or any skin irritation. It also moisturizes and restores balance, leaving your skin feeling calm and refreshed.

name: Floral Bliss Perfume
title: ScentAura Floral Bliss Perfume
description: ScentAura Floral Bliss Perfume is a captivating fragrance that combines the elegance of roses, jasmine, and lavender. Its light, floral notes create a refreshing and romantic atmosphere, perfect for daily wear and special occasions.

name: Citrus Breeze Perfume
title: ZestEssence Citrus Breeze Perfume
description: ZestEssence Citrus Breeze Perfume features a lively blend of citrus fruits such as lemon, orange, and grapefruit. This refreshing fragrance is perfect for those who enjoy a zesty, energizing scent that uplifts the senses.

name: Oceanic Wave Perfume
title: AquaMist Oceanic Wave Perfume
description: AquaMist Oceanic Wave Perfume offers an invigorating fragrance inspired by the sea. The blend of marine notes with hints of fresh florals and soft musk creates a calming, fresh scent, perfect for a cool, breezy day.

name: Mystic Oud Perfume
title: RoyalScents Mystic Oud Perfume
description: RoyalScents Mystic Oud Perfume is a luxurious fragrance that blends rich oud with warm amber and exotic spices. This deep, woody scent is ideal for evening wear and special occasions, exuding sophistication and mystery.

name: Vanilla Dream Perfume
title: SweetAura Vanilla Dream Perfume
description: SweetAura Vanilla Dream Perfume offers a warm and inviting fragrance with rich vanilla and subtle hints of caramel and coconut. This sweet, comforting scent is perfect for cozy evenings and casual wear.

name: Amber Seduction Perfume
title: SensualMist Amber Seduction Perfume
description: SensualMist Amber Seduction Perfume is an alluring fragrance featuring rich amber, musk, and a touch of vanilla. The blend of warm, sensual notes creates a captivating scent that lingers and leaves a lasting impression.

name: Lavender Serenity Perfume
title: PureEssence Lavender Serenity Perfume
description: PureEssence Lavender Serenity Perfume is a calming fragrance that captures the essence of fresh lavender fields. The soothing notes of lavender, combined with a touch of bergamot, create a tranquil and peaceful scent that helps to unwind.

name: Cherry Blossom Perfume
title: FloralChic Cherry Blossom Perfume
description: FloralChic Cherry Blossom Perfume features the delicate and sweet fragrance of cherry blossoms, mixed with hints of jasmine and peony. This floral fragrance is perfect for spring and summer, offering a fresh and youthful scent.

name: Spiced Rose Perfume
title: ElysianScents Spiced Rose Perfume
description: ElysianScents Spiced Rose Perfume is a captivating blend of fresh rose petals and spicy cinnamon, giving it a warm and inviting fragrance. Ideal for those who enjoy floral yet spicy scents, perfect for both day and night.

name: Elegant Frock
title: Royal Frock Dress
description: This royal frock is a perfect choice for any special occasion. Designed with intricate lacework and a delicate satin finish, it offers an elegant and classic look. The fine craftsmanship and soft fabric ensure your little one feels comfortable and stylish while standing out with this timeless dress.

name: Casual Top
title: Summer Breeze Top
description: A light and airy top, ideal for warm weather. The breathable fabric and modern design ensure comfort without sacrificing style. Whether for a casual outing or a relaxed day at home, this top brings the perfect balance of cool comfort and trendy flair.

name: Traditional Lehenga
title: Festive Lehenga Set
description: This festive lehenga set combines elegance with tradition. Designed with beautiful embroidery and rich, flowing fabric, it is perfect for weddings or festive occasions. The set includes a gracefully designed blouse and dupatta, all crafted with care to provide a comfortable yet stylish experience.

name: Charming Frock
title: Fairytale Princess Frock
description: This fairytale-inspired frock will make your child feel like a princess. The delicate floral embellishments and flowing skirt make it a charming piece for any occasion. Perfect for birthday parties or family events, this dress combines beauty and comfort for hours of wear.

name: Stylish Top
title: Chic Sleeveless Top
description: A chic sleeveless top that pairs perfectly with skirts or jeans. Its modern cut and breathable fabric make it ideal for summer days. The simple yet fashionable design can be dressed up or down, making it a versatile piece in any wardrobe.

name: Exquisite Lehenga
title: Royal Wedding Lehenga
description: A royal lehenga set, perfect for brides or for attending grand celebrations. Featuring intricate embroidery and a gorgeous color palette, this lehenga exudes a timeless elegance. The soft fabric ensures a comfortable fit, while the luxurious design guarantees you’ll be the center of attention.

name: Festive Frock
title: Gold-Trimmed Frock
description: This gold-trimmed frock is the ultimate choice for any festive occasion. The luxurious fabric and sparkling gold details make this dress perfect for family gatherings, festivals, or any celebration. It offers the ideal combination of comfort and opulence for a truly royal look.

name: Creamy Tomato Soup
title: Rich & Creamy Tomato Soup
description: A heartwarming bowl of tomato soup made with fresh tomatoes, cream, and herbs, served with crispy garlic bread.

name: Mushroom Soup
title: Velvety Mushroom Soup
description: A rich and creamy mushroom soup infused with fresh herbs, garlic, and a hint of butter, creating an exquisite taste.

name: Chicken Corn Soup
title: Classic Chicken Corn Soup
description: A nutritious and flavorful soup made with tender chicken, sweet corn, and a blend of aromatic spices.

name: Cheese Stuffed Bell Peppers
title: Cheesy Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Fresh bell peppers stuffed with a delicious mix of cheese, herbs, and spices, baked to perfection for a mouthwatering dish.

name: Trendy Top
title: Boho Vibes Top
description: A boho-inspired top, this piece features bold patterns and a relaxed fit, making it perfect for casual outings. The lightweight fabric and loose design provide a breezy feel, ideal for spring and summer wear. Pair it with jeans, shorts, or skirts for a stylish, carefree look.

name: Princess Lehenga
title: Pink Satin Lehenga
description: This satin lehenga is designed for those looking to add a touch of royalty to their wardrobe. The soft pink fabric is complemented by detailed embroidery and an elegant design, making it the perfect attire for weddings or festive events.

name: Glamour Frock
title: Dazzling Sequin Frock
description: A dazzling frock made to turn heads. The shimmering sequins cover the entire dress, creating a beautiful, sparkling effect in any light. Whether for a birthday party or a celebration, this dress ensures your child will shine and sparkle all day long.

name: Elegant Top
title: Silk Evening Top
description: A luxurious silk evening top that adds a touch of sophistication to any event. With its smooth texture and timeless design, this top pairs well with skirts or trousers, providing a polished and elegant look for evening gatherings or formal occasions.

name: Wedding Lehenga
title: Gold Embroidered Lehenga
description: This gold-embroidered lehenga is perfect for weddings or formal celebrations. Designed with fine craftsmanship, the lehenga features intricate gold detailing and soft fabric, ensuring comfort while making a grand statement at any special event.

name: Playful Frock
title: Rainbow Twirl Frock
description: This playful frock features bright, colorful stripes that form a rainbow pattern. The twirl-worthy design and soft fabric make it a fun choice for kids who love to move and play. Perfect for casual outings or parties, this dress offers both comfort and joy.

name: Bootcut Jeans
title: Black Bootcut Jeans
description: The black bootcut jeans offer a classic yet fashionable style, perfect for casual outings. The slightly flared leg creates a balanced look, ideal for pairing with boots or sneakers. The durable fabric ensures long-lasting comfort.

name: High-Waisted Jeans
title: Light Wash High-Waisted Jeans
description: These light-wash high-waisted jeans offer a trendy, retro-inspired fit that flatters the figure. The high-rise design elongates the legs, while the soft, comfortable fabric ensures all-day wearability.

name: Relaxed Fit Trousers
title: Beige Relaxed Fit Trousers
description: These beige relaxed-fit trousers are ideal for all-day comfort. Made with a breathable, lightweight fabric, they provide a laid-back yet stylish look. Perfect for casual or semi-formal outings, the trousers are versatile for different occasions.

name: Skinny Jeans
title: Dark Wash Skinny Jeans
description: These dark-wash skinny jeans are perfect for creating a sleek and modern look. With a snug fit from waist to ankle, they provide a flattering silhouette. The durable denim fabric makes them suitable for both casual and dressy occasions.

name: Chino Trousers
title: Navy Blue Chino Trousers
description: The navy blue chino trousers offer a classic and clean look with a comfortable fit. Crafted with lightweight cotton, they are breathable and perfect for warmer months. The design is versatile enough to be worn at work or during casual events.

name: Cropped Jeans
title: White Cropped Jeans
description: These white cropped jeans add a fun, fresh touch to any wardrobe. The slightly cropped design offers a relaxed and trendy vibe, ideal for pairing with summer tops and sandals. The breathable fabric ensures comfort throughout the day.

name: Classic Trousers
title: Black Classic Trousers
description: These black classic trousers are a wardrobe essential, offering a timeless and versatile fit. Perfect for both office wear and casual outings, the soft fabric ensures all-day comfort while maintaining a polished look.

name: Cargo Jeans
title: Olive Green Cargo Jeans
description: These olive green cargo jeans are perfect for a rugged yet stylish look. With functional pockets and a relaxed fit, they offer both practicality and comfort. Ideal for casual outdoor activities or adding a laid-back touch to everyday wear.

name: Basic T-shirt
title: Plain White T-shirt
description: This classic white T-shirt is made from soft cotton, perfect for layering or wearing solo. Its simple design makes it versatile for any casual outing or as a base for adding accessories.

name: Graphic T-shirt
title: Black Graphic T-shirt
description: This black graphic T-shirt features a bold design on the front, offering a unique style. Made from high-quality cotton, it's breathable and comfortable for daily wear.

name: Striped Shirt
title: Blue Striped Shirt
description: This blue striped shirt offers a sharp and polished look. The lightweight fabric ensures comfort, while the clean lines and stripes make it ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Casual T-shirt
title: Grey Casual T-shirt
description: This grey casual T-shirt is perfect for everyday wear. With its simple, timeless design and soft fabric, it provides comfort and versatility for any laid-back occasion.

name: Checkered Shirt
title: Red Checkered Shirt
description: The red checkered shirt is a wardrobe classic with a modern twist. Made from a breathable cotton blend, this shirt can be dressed up or down for both casual and semi-formal looks.

name: V-neck T-shirt
title: White V-neck T-shirt
description: This white V-neck T-shirt features a sleek design with a modern cut. The breathable fabric and comfortable fit make it an ideal choice for everyday wear or layering.

name: Polo Shirt
title: Navy Blue Polo Shirt
description: This navy blue polo shirt is made from soft cotton and designed for ultimate comfort. It features a classic collar and button-down front, making it perfect for casual or semi-formal events.

name: Graphic Sweatshirt
title: Red Graphic Sweatshirt
description: This red graphic sweatshirt stands out with its bold front design. Made with soft and cozy fabric, it's perfect for layering over T-shirts or wearing on chilly days.

name: Basic Sweatshirt
title: Grey Basic Sweatshirt
description: This basic grey sweatshirt is made for comfort and style. Perfect for layering or wearing alone, the soft fabric and simple design make it a wardrobe staple for casual days.

name: Casual Shirt
title: Light Blue Casual Shirt
description: This light blue casual shirt is made from breathable fabric, making it ideal for warmer weather. Its versatile style works for casual outings or can be dressed up for a more refined look.

name: Long Sleeve T-shirt
title: Black Long Sleeve T-shirt
description: This black long-sleeve T-shirt offers a sleek and comfortable design. The lightweight cotton fabric keeps you cool while providing coverage on cooler days. Perfect for casual wear.

name: Solid Sweatshirt
title: Blue Solid Sweatshirt
description: The blue solid sweatshirt is made from a soft fleece material that keeps you warm and cozy. Its simple design makes it a versatile piece for casual wear during colder months.

name: Plaid Shirt
title: Green Plaid Shirt
description: This green plaid shirt is made of soft cotton, offering a comfortable and stylish look. The classic plaid pattern is perfect for a casual day out or layering over a T-shirt.

name: Hooded Sweatshirt
title: Gray Hooded Sweatshirt
description: The gray hooded sweatshirt is a cozy and versatile piece made with soft fabric. The adjustable hood adds an extra layer of warmth, making it ideal for outdoor activities or casual days.

name: Lavender Body Oil
title: Lavender Infused Body Oil
description: This soothing lavender-infused body oil is designed to calm your skin and mind. Made with natural ingredients, it helps moisturize and nourish the skin, leaving it soft and fragrant.

name: Coconut Body Oil
title: Coconut Hydrating Body Oil
description: This coconut body oil is rich in natural hydration, leaving your skin feeling deeply moisturized and soft. Its tropical scent will make you feel like you're on a beach vacation.

name: Rosemary Body Oil
title: Rosemary Nourishing Body Oil
description: This rosemary body oil is perfect for deep hydration and revitalizing your skin. Infused with essential oils, it provides a fresh, invigorating scent while moisturizing your skin.

name: Argan Body Oil
title: Argan Oil Moisturizing Body Oil
description: This luxurious argan body oil is enriched with Vitamin E and fatty acids that help hydrate and smooth your skin. It absorbs quickly and leaves the skin feeling soft and nourished.

name: Almond Body Oil
title: Sweet Almond Body Oil
description: This almond body oil helps improve skin elasticity and provides deep moisture. With a light, sweet scent, it absorbs quickly and leaves your skin feeling silky and soft.

name: Jojoba Body Oil
title: Jojoba Oil Hydrating Body Oil
description: Jojoba body oil is known for its deep moisturizing properties, ideal for dry skin. It nourishes, heals, and replenishes your skin while leaving a light, pleasant fragrance.

name: Vitamin E Body Oil
title: Vitamin E Rich Body Oil
description: This Vitamin E body oil is perfect for rejuvenating tired, dull skin. It helps in reducing scars, stretch marks, and keeps your skin soft and hydrated.

name: Shea Butter Body Oil
title: Shea Butter Nourishing Body Oil
description: Shea butter body oil is perfect for deep hydration. This rich, buttery oil is full of vitamins and essential fatty acids that help improve skin texture, keeping it moisturized and supple.

name: Grapeseed Body Oil
title: Grapeseed Oil Repairing Body Oil
description: Grapeseed body oil is a natural source of antioxidants that help repair and rejuvenate damaged skin. It has a light, non-greasy formula that is ideal for everyday use.

name: Cozy Top
title: Winter Cozy Top
description: A warm and cozy top, perfect for chilly weather. Crafted with thick, soft fabric, this top ensures comfort while providing a stylish look for the colder months. It pairs easily with jeans or leggings for a perfect winter outfit.

name: Trendy Lehenga
title: Modern Chic Lehenga
description: A contemporary lehenga designed for the modern woman. With its chic patterns and flattering fit, this lehenga combines tradition and style, making it the perfect choice for formal events or festive occasions.

name: Floral Frock
title: Floral Lace Frock
description: A delicate floral lace frock designed for spring and summer. The floral patterns and soft lace fabric make it a graceful piece for any outing, offering a timeless and elegant look for your little one.

name: Chic Top
title: Chic Striped Top
description: This striped top is perfect for casual days. Its modern design and stretchy fabric make it comfortable while maintaining a stylish look. Pair it with jeans or skirts for an effortless, fashionable appearance.

name: Traditional Lehenga
title: Heritage Lehenga Set
description: This heritage lehenga set is a blend of rich tradition and modern design. Perfect for cultural events, the lehenga features traditional embroidery and stunning fabric, making it an ideal choice for festivals and family celebrations.

name: Slim Fit Jeans
title: Blue Slim Fit Jeans
description: These blue slim-fit jeans are perfect for a stylish and comfortable everyday look. The soft denim fabric offers stretch for ease of movement, while the modern cut provides a sleek, fashionable silhouette. Ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Straight Leg Trousers
title: Gray Straight Leg Trousers
description: These gray straight-leg trousers are made from soft, high-quality fabric, offering both comfort and durability. With a classic fit and neutral color, they are versatile for workwear, meetings, or any semi-formal setting.

name: Handheld Balp
title: Mini Handheld Balp
description: This mini handheld balp is compact and easy to use. Perfect for a variety of tasks with its powerful motor and lightweight design.

name: Electric Balp
title: Electric Smoothie Balp
description: This electric balp is ideal for smooth operations, perfect for blending, mixing, and processing with its durable stainless steel components.

name: Mini Balp
title: Mini Balp Machine
description: This mini balp machine is ideal for small servings. Whether you need to blend a smoothie or mix small ingredients, it’s convenient and easy to use.

name: Gaming Laptop
title: High-Performance Gaming Laptop
description: This high-performance gaming laptop features a powerful Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and an NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti graphics card. It's built to handle the most demanding games and applications with ease.

name: Desktop PC
title: All-in-One Desktop PC
description: This all-in-one desktop PC features a sleek design with a 24-inch display. It comes equipped with an Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and a 1TB hard drive, offering great performance for both work and entertainment.

name: Split Air Conditioner
title: Split Air Conditioner 1.5 Ton
description: This energy-efficient split air conditioner offers 1.5 ton cooling capacity, perfect for medium-sized rooms. It features smart temperature control, quiet operation, and a sleek design.

name: Portable Air Conditioner
title: Portable 1 Ton Air Conditioner
description: This portable air conditioner is perfect for smaller spaces. With a 1-ton capacity, it cools effectively and is easy to move from room to room. It also comes with a dehumidifier function.

name: Window Air Conditioner
title: Window Air Conditioner 1 Ton
description: The 1-ton window air conditioner is ideal for smaller rooms. It provides effective cooling with multiple fan speeds, energy-saving features, and is easy to install.

name: Smart Air Conditioner
title: Smart 1.5 Ton Air Conditioner
description: This smart air conditioner offers 1.5 tons of cooling power with Wi-Fi connectivity, allowing you to control it remotely. It features energy-efficient technology and a sleek, modern design.

name: Table Fan
title: Portable Table Fan
description: This portable table fan is perfect for personal use. With adjustable speed settings and an oscillating function, it provides a refreshing breeze in any room.

name: Tower Fan
title: Slim Tower Fan
description: This slim tower fan offers space-saving design while delivering powerful airflow. It features multiple speed settings, a quiet motor, and a modern look for any room.

name: Pedestal Fan
title: Adjustable Pedestal Fan
description: This adjustable pedestal fan allows you to control the height and direction of airflow. With its powerful motor and quiet operation, it's perfect for larger rooms.

name: Garlic Chicken Shish Kebab
title: Garlic Infused Chicken Kebab
description: Mouthwatering grilled chicken shish kebabs marinated with a flavorful garlic-infused sauce, served with fresh herbs and a side of yogurt dip.

name: Honey Glazed Chicken Shish Kebab
title: Sweet & Savory Honey Glazed Chicken Kebab
description: A perfect balance of sweet and savory flavors, these grilled chicken shish kebabs are brushed with a honey glaze and garnished with sesame seeds.

name: Lemon Herb Chicken Shish Kebab
title: Zesty Lemon Herb Chicken Kebab
description: Grilled chicken kebabs marinated with fresh lemon juice, herbs, and a touch of olive oil, delivering a refreshing and tangy taste.

name: Spicy Stuffed Peppers
title: Hot & Spicy Stuffed Peppers
description: A fiery combination of bell peppers stuffed with spicy seasoned ground meat and melted cheese, perfect for spice lovers.

name: Hydrating Cream
title: GlowBeauty Hydrating Cream
description: GlowBeauty Hydrating Cream is a deeply moisturizing formula designed to replenish and lock in moisture for all-day hydration. It nourishes dry skin and improves texture, making your skin feel soft, smooth, and rejuvenated. Ideal for all skin types, this cream will leave your skin feeling hydrated and glowing, perfect for daily use.

name: Anti-Aging Cream
title: AgePerfect Anti-Aging Cream
description: AgePerfect Anti-Aging Cream is specially formulated to target the signs of aging. It works effectively to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, making your skin smoother, firmer, and more youthful. The cream also helps restore elasticity and improves the skin's texture, leaving you with a radiant and fresh appearance. Ideal for mature skin, it provides the perfect anti-aging treatment.

name: Box Fan
title: Compact Box Fan
description: This compact box fan offers a strong breeze in a small, convenient design. It’s lightweight, portable, and ideal for cooling down small to medium-sized spaces.

name: USB Fan
title: Rechargeable USB Fan
description: This rechargeable USB fan is perfect for on-the-go cooling. With a compact design and multiple speed settings, it can be powered via USB, making it ideal for travel and office use.

name: Ceiling Fan
title: Energy-Efficient Ceiling Fan
description: This energy-efficient ceiling fan comes with a remote control for convenience. It’s designed to provide maximum airflow while minimizing energy consumption, making it perfect for large spaces.

name: Single Door Freezer
title: Compact Single Door Freezer
description: This compact single door freezer offers efficient freezing with a capacity of 200 liters. It's ideal for small homes, apartments, or offices, providing quick access to frozen food.

name: Double Door Freezer
title: Energy-Efficient Double Door Freezer
description: This energy-efficient double door freezer offers 300 liters of storage space, making it perfect for larger households. It comes with adjustable temperature settings and a fast freeze function.

name: Chest Freezer
title: Chest Freezer 400L
description: This chest freezer provides ample storage space of 400 liters and is designed for high capacity freezing. It's perfect for large families or small businesses with storage needs for frozen goods.

name: Mini Freezer
title: Compact 100L Mini Freezer
description: This mini freezer is perfect for small spaces with a 100-liter capacity. It provides excellent freezing power with a space-saving design, making it ideal for apartments or dorm rooms.

name: Side-by-Side Freezer
title: Side-by-Side Freezer with Refrigerator
description: This side-by-side freezer and refrigerator combination offers convenience and style with a total capacity of 550 liters. It includes multiple compartments for easy organization and advanced cooling technology.

name: Laptop 1
title: Dell Inspiron 15
description: The Dell Inspiron 15 offers great performance for everyday tasks, featuring an Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and a 256GB SSD. It's perfect for work, school, and entertainment.

name: Laptop 2
title: HP Pavilion x360
description: The HP Pavilion x360 is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a 14-inch touchscreen display. Powered by an Intel Core i7 processor and 16GB of RAM, it's perfect for multitasking and creative work.

name: Laptop 3
title: Asus VivoBook 15
description: The Asus VivoBook 15 offers great value with its 15.6-inch Full HD display, Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 512GB SSD. It's an ideal choice for work and entertainment on the go.

name: Laptop 4
title: Apple MacBook Air
description: The Apple MacBook Air is known for its sleek design and powerful performance. With an Apple M1 chip, 8GB of RAM, and 256GB SSD, it's perfect for those seeking a portable yet high-performance laptop.

name: Convection Oven
title: Countertop Convection Oven
description: This countertop convection oven features rapid heat circulation to cook food faster and more evenly. With multiple cooking modes, it’s perfect for baking, roasting, and broiling.

name: Microwave Oven
title: Microwave Oven with Grill
description: This microwave oven comes with grill functionality, allowing you to heat, defrost, and cook a variety of foods. Its user-friendly interface and sleek design make it a great addition to any kitchen.

name: Wall Oven
title: Wall-Mounted Electric Oven
description: This wall-mounted electric oven offers spacious cooking capacity, easy-to-use touch controls, and multiple cooking presets. Perfect for larger kitchens and home chefs.

name: Toaster Oven
title: Compact Toaster Oven
description: This compact toaster oven is perfect for quick meals and snacks. It features adjustable temperature settings and a timer, ideal for toasting, baking, and reheating.

name: Double Oven
title: Double Wall Oven
description: This double wall oven features two spacious compartments, each with its own temperature controls. It’s perfect for preparing large meals or multiple dishes at once.

name: Air Fryer Oven
title: Air Fryer Oven Combo
description: This air fryer oven combines the functions of an oven and air fryer, allowing you to bake, fry, grill, and roast with less oil for healthier meals. Its large capacity makes it perfect for families.

name: Curved Monitor
title: 27-inch Curved Gaming Monitor
description: This 27-inch curved gaming monitor offers an immersive experience with a 144Hz refresh rate and a 1ms response time. Perfect for gamers who demand smooth visuals and high performance.

name: 4K Monitor
title: 32-inch 4K UHD Monitor
description: This 32-inch 4K UHD monitor delivers stunning clarity and color accuracy, making it ideal for professionals in creative fields like graphic design, video editing, and photography.

name: Gaming Monitor
title: 24-inch Full HD Gaming Monitor
description: This 24-inch Full HD gaming monitor features a 165Hz refresh rate and a 0.5ms response time, ensuring ultra-smooth gameplay for competitive gamers.

name: UltraWide Monitor
title: 34-inch UltraWide Monitor
description: The 34-inch UltraWide monitor provides expansive screen real estate, perfect for multitasking, gaming, or professional work requiring multiple windows at once.

name: Touchscreen Monitor
title: 27-inch Touchscreen Monitor
description: This 27-inch touchscreen monitor offers responsive touch functionality and is ideal for professionals in design, sales, or interactive applications.

name: LED Monitor
title: 24-inch LED Backlit Monitor
description: This 24-inch LED backlit monitor delivers clear and bright visuals with excellent color contrast, making it perfect for home office setups or casual use.

name: iPhone 14
title: Apple iPhone 14
description: The iPhone 14 offers a stunning 6.1-inch display, A15 Bionic chip, and dual-camera system. It's designed for a smooth and powerful user experience with enhanced performance.

name: iPhone 13 Pro
title: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro features an OLED display, 120Hz refresh rate, and triple-camera system for superior photo and video quality. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip, it delivers top-tier performance.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
title: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is equipped with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888, and a 64MP camera for capturing high-quality photos and videos.

name: Samsung Galaxy Note 20
title: Samsung Galaxy Note 20
description: The Samsung Galaxy Note 20 features a large 6.9-inch display, powerful Exynos 990 processor, and an S Pen for enhanced productivity.

name: Oppo Reno 6 Pro
title: Oppo Reno 6 Pro
description: The Oppo Reno 6 Pro boasts a 6.55-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 870 processor, and 64MP quad-camera system for stunning photography.

name: Oppo A74
title: Oppo A74
description: The Oppo A74 features a 6.43-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 480 5G chipset, and a 48MP camera for a balanced mobile experience.

name: Vivo V21e
title: Vivo V21e
description: Vivo V21e features a 6.44-inch AMOLED display, dual 44MP front and rear cameras, and a MediaTek Dimensity 700 processor for smooth performance.

name: Vivo Y73
title: Vivo Y73
description: Vivo Y73 features a 6.44-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 678 chipset, and a 64MP primary camera for capturing clear and sharp images.

name: Mi 11X Pro
title: Mi 11X Pro
description: The Mi 11X Pro features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 chipset, and a 108MP camera to offer high-performance gaming and photography.

name: Mi 10T
title: Mi 10T
description: The Mi 10T features a 6.67-inch display, Snapdragon 865, and a 64MP camera. It’s a well-rounded phone for gaming, photography, and everyday use.

name: iPhone SE (2020)
title: iPhone SE (2020)
description: The iPhone SE (2020) features a 4.7-inch display, A13 Bionic chip, and a 12MP camera, delivering powerful performance in a compact design.

name: Samsung Galaxy A52
title: Samsung Galaxy A52
description: The Samsung Galaxy A52 features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 720G chipset, and a 64MP quad-camera system for all-around performance.

name: Oppo F19 Pro
title: Oppo F19 Pro
description: Oppo F19 Pro features a 6.43-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Helio P95 processor, and a 48MP camera for an impressive photography experience.

name: Vivo Y20G
title: Vivo Y20G
description: The Vivo Y20G features a 6.51-inch display, MediaTek Helio G80 chipset, and a 13MP camera for capturing detailed photos.

name: Mi 11 Lite
title: Mi 11 Lite
description: Mi 11 Lite is an ultra-slim smartphone with a 6.55-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 732G, and a 64MP camera for high-quality photography.

name: iPhone 12 Mini
title: iPhone 12 Mini
description: The iPhone 12 Mini offers a compact 5.4-inch OLED display, A14 Bionic chip, and dual 12MP cameras for capturing beautiful photos in a smaller form factor.

name: Samsung Galaxy M32
title: Samsung Galaxy M32
description: The Samsung Galaxy M32 features a 6.4-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Helio G80 chipset, and a 64MP camera for excellent value for money.

name: Oppo Reno 5
title: Oppo Reno 5
description: The Oppo Reno 5 features a 6.43-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 720G processor, and a 64MP quad-camera system for detailed shots.

name: Vivo X60
title: Vivo X60
description: Vivo X60 features a 6.56-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 870 chipset, and a 48MP camera with gimbal stabilization for superior photography.

name: Mi 10i
title: Mi 10i
description: Mi 10i features a 6.67-inch display, Snapdragon 750G chipset, and a 108MP camera for powerful photography and gaming.

name: iPhone 11 Pro
title: iPhone 11 Pro
description: The iPhone 11 Pro features a 5.8-inch Super Retina XDR display, A13 Bionic chip, and a triple-camera system for exceptional photo and video quality.

name: Juicer Balp
title: Juicer Balp Combo
description: The juicer balp combo is designed to help you make fresh juices and blends effortlessly, with a strong motor ensuring quick results.

name: Portable Balp
title: Portable Rechargeable Balp
description: This portable rechargeable balp is perfect for use on the go. With its compact design, you can take it anywhere and use it conveniently for blending and mixing.

name: Compact Balp
title: Compact Mini Balp
description: The compact mini balp is perfect for small kitchens or tight spaces. It provides powerful performance without taking up much room.

name: Balp Set
title: Balp Set with Attachments
description: This balp set includes multiple attachments for blending, chopping, and mixing. Its versatility makes it ideal for different tasks in the kitchen.

name: Electric Hand Balp
title: Electric Hand Balp
description: This electric hand balp features a powerful motor, allowing you to quickly process ingredients with ease. Ideal for both home and professional use.

name: Smoothie Balp
title: Smoothie Maker Balp
description: This smoothie maker balp blends ingredients quickly to create smooth, creamy results. It’s designed for smoothie lovers who want the perfect consistency.

name: Samsung Galaxy A32
title: Samsung Galaxy A32
description: The Samsung Galaxy A32 offers a 6.4-inch Super AMOLED display, MediaTek Helio G80, and a 64MP camera.

name: Oppo A15
title: Oppo A15
description: Oppo A15 features a 6.52-inch display, MediaTek Helio P35 processor, and a 13MP camera for daily use and value.

name: Vivo Y12s
title: Vivo Y12s
description: Vivo Y12s features a 6.51-inch display, MediaTek Helio P35, and a 13MP dual-camera system, offering solid performance at a budget price.

name: Ergonomic Chair
title: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: This ergonomic office chair from Vivo provides excellent support for long working hours. With adjustable armrests and lumbar support, it's designed for comfort and productivity.

name: Gaming Chair
title: Vivo Gaming Chair
description: Designed for gamers, the Vivo gaming chair provides comfort with adjustable features and a high-back design. Its sleek, racing-style look is perfect for your gaming setup.

name: Mi Reclining Sofa
title: Mi Reclining Sofa Set
description: The Mi reclining sofa set offers comfort with high-density foam cushioning and a sleek design. Perfect for relaxing after a long day, it reclines for maximum comfort.

name: Modern Armchair
title: Vivo Modern Armchair
description: This stylish modern armchair from Vivo combines comfort and elegance. With a soft, plush seat and sleek design, it's perfect for both contemporary and classic interiors.

name: Mi Sofa Lounge
title: Mi Sofa Lounge Set
description: This luxurious sofa lounge from Mi is designed for ultimate comfort with its plush seating and modern design. It fits perfectly into any living room or lounge space.

name: Vivo Office Chair
title: Vivo Office Executive Chair
description: The Vivo office executive chair is designed with comfort in mind. With adjustable features and supportive backrest, it's the ideal chair for both work and relaxation.
